text: Rojancya ratrita apalya patnicya javala janyaci tumhala paravanagi ahe. Tya tumacya posakha aheta ani tumhi tyance posakha ahata. Tumhi lapuna chapuna kelelya khiyanatice allahala jnana ahe. Tyane tumaci tauba (ksama-yacana) kabula karuna tumhala mapha kele. Ata tumhala tyancyasi samagama karanyaca ani allahane lihuna thevalele prapta karanyaca adesa ahe. Tumhi khata-pita raha.Yetheparyarnta ki pratahkalacya saphedica dhaga andharacya kalya dhagyapasuna vegala vhava, maga ratra ho'iparyanta roja purna kara ani apalya patnisi asa veli sambhoga karu naka, jevha tumhi masjidimmadhye etikapha (eka tharavika avadhiparyanta, allahaci upasana karanyacya hetune svatahla masjidacya hadditaca rokhanee) madhye asala, ya allahane ghatalelya maryada aheta. Tumhi tyancya javalahi ja'u naka. Asa prakare allaha apalya nisanya, lokanna spasta karuna sangato, yasathi ki tyanni allahace bhaya rakhuna duskarmampasuna dura rahave
